title: COVID 19 Activity Resources: Online Programming | Campus Recreation | University of Illinois at Chicago
contents: Skip to the content of this page ,  the main menu , the site search form , the site home page .           Campus Recreation     Search the site     Toggle Menu      Search                  Campus Recreation      Campus Recreation   Main Menu    About Us           Mission Vision & Values    Exercise is Medicine On Campus    Sustainability    Inclusive Recreation    Social Media    Contact Us         Facilities           Student Recreation Facility    Sport & Fitness Center    Outdoor Field Complex    Facility Rentals & Reservations    Guest WiFi    Policies         Programs           Aquatics    Climbing Wall    Intramural Sports    Outdoor Adventure    Sport Clubs    Team Challenge    Youth Program         Fitness&Wellness           F45    Fitness Classes    Fitness Testing    Injury Screenings    Massage    Personal Training    Nutrition    Virtual Ask a Coach         Memberships           Membership Types    Electronic Fund Transfer (EFT)    Guest Information    Cancellations         Employment     Eyebrow menu    UIC Connection    Student Affairs    Injury Screenings    UIC menu    UIC.edu    Campus Map       Search                     COVID 19 Activity Resources: Online Programming    Posted on March 25, 2020         Online Programming   Please use this resource list for avenues to keep yourself active during the COVID-19 pandemic. Some of the options below are free of charge, and some of them are free trial periods, requiring entry of a credit card, which could result in payment drafting once the trial period ends. Please be aware, these options are only suggestions for assisting in remaining physically active during a time period where access to traditional fitness centers and equipment may be unavailable.  Participation in Group Fitness Classes is completely voluntary. There are risks and hazards, minor and serious, associated with participation in Group Fitness Classes. Participants voluntarily assume all responsibility and risk of loss, damage, illness, and/or injury to person or property associated with participation in Group Fitness Classes. Group Fitness Classes require a minimum level of fitness to participate safely. The Campus Recreation Department strongly advises participants to consult with their physician if they have any doubts of their physical ability to safely participate.    Check out the main Drop In group fitness page for the upcoming Drop-In Zoom classes.  Drop-In Fitness       Intramural Sports     With the stay at home order in effect and our in person sporting events currently suspended, we wanted to let you know about some leagues that you can do at home to get involved! We are excited to let you know that NEW eSports leagues are available for registration!  Join today to compete in leagues for FIFA, MADDEN NFL, NBA2K, and NHL - and all games are played at your home on your own console! These leagues will utilize 'ladder scheduling', so all players are able to compete at a day/time that works for them, and if they win, they move up the ladder! All current students, faculty, and staff are eligible to participate, so head over to IMLeagues.com to sign up for FREE and view additional league details*. Winning players will receive the Spring Champion shirt and pint glass!  If you have any questions, please contact John Manning via email (manningj@uic.edu).  (*NOTE: Must be a current UIC student, faculty, or staff member to participate in Intramural eSports)    FIFA  MADDEN NFL  NBA2K  NHL      Platforms: PlayStation & XBOX  Platforms: PlayStation & XBOX  Platforms: PlayStation & XBOX  Platforms: PlayStation & XBOX    Registration Deadline: 04/01 @ 11:59 AM  Registration Deadline: 04/01 @ 11:59 AM  Registration Deadline: 04/01 @ 11:59 AM  Registration Deadline: 04/01 @ 11:59 AM    League Dates: 04/01 - 04/22  League Dates: 04/01 - 04/22  League Dates: 04/01 - 04/22  League Dates: 04/01 - 04/22         Register NOW at  IMLeagues.com       Additional Online Resources   Multiple formats within Single Platform:  Life Fitness ● Free online workout videos ● Proper form, alignment and safety cues provided ● Minimal to no equipment  LesMills ● Free online workout videos ● HIIT, Total Body, Bodycombat, Dance, Grit, Meditation ● No equipment options  ObéFitness ● Live and on-demand fitness classes with a 30-day free trial (use code ATHOME) ● Cardio, strength, and yoga/stretch based classes ● Minimal to no equipment  Fitness Blender ● Free cardio, strength and stretch workout videos ● No equipment option  TRX App ● Create a profile and use code YUPVKVHVRW ● Download and login to the TRX App from the App Store or Google Play ● TRX equipment required for some workoutsSingle Platform:  Nike Training Club App ● Free guided workouts ● Bodyweight-only, yoga classes, targeted training programs, and full-equipment home workouts for all fitness levels  Strength & Cardio Formats:  Tone It Up ● Daily online workouts with a 7-day free trial ● Tone It Up app free for the next month for new members ● No equipment options  Beachbody ● Free 14-day trial ● Have to input credit card info then monthly subscription required ● No equipment options  Planet Fitness Home Work-Ins ● Live-streaming workouts 6pm CT everyday ● Will be available to re-watch  CrossFit ● Free at-home workout videos including single exercises, drills and additional health information ● Some movements require equipment  NEOU ● Various live, on-demand workouts with a 30-day free trial ● Growing online library of workout classes with 60 different fitness concepts ● Credit card required then subscription required  Fhitting Room ● On demand HIIT and strength workouts with a 30-day free trial ● No equipment options  Daily Burn ● Free 30-day trial then monthly subscription required ● 1000 workouts taught certified trainers ● Analyzes fitness preferences goals and gives you a plan ● No equipment options  Peloton ● Free 90-day digital membership trial then subscription required ● Can download the app on the app store/google play without having to enter credit card ● No Peloton equipment required  SweatyBetty ● Free online workout videos  Mind/Body & Recovery Formats:  Flow Yoga Center ● By donation, sign up and reserve for your spot on the Zoom call for a live class  Yogaworks ● Online yoga classes with a 14-day free trial, then subscription required  Down Dog App ● Free yoga, HIIT and barre classes until April 1, 2020 ● Yoga for Beginners, HIIT, Barre, and 7 Minute Workout ● Offering free access until July 1st for all students and teachers (K-12 and college). Sign up with .edu email  Pilates Anytime ● Access to 3,400 pilates videos ● Free 15-day trial then subscription required  Yoga Fit Free access to online Yoga and Meditation Workouts No account or log in required    Dance Formats:  Barre3 ● Free 15-day trial ● Conditioning, cardio, and mindfulness  The Bar Method Online ● Free 14-day trial ● No equipment options  SHINE Dance Fitness ● 3 Day free trial, then subscription required ● Credit card information required      Modified on April 07, 2020
